abstract.text: Registers fonts from the specified font URLs with the font manager.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: A file URL for the fonts or collections (in TTC or OTC format) to register. After registering fonts from a file, don’t move or rename the file.
A scope constant that defines the availability and lifetime of the registration. If you specify
when you register fonts on iOS, those fonts aren’t automatically available to other processes. Other processes can call
to get access to those fonts. See
for more details.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the font derived from the URL should be enabled for font descriptor matching and discoverable through
A block called as errors arise or upon completion.
The block’s
parameter contains an array of
references; an empty array indicates no errors. Each error reference contains a
of font descriptors corresponding to
. These URLs represent the font files causing the error and failing to register successfully.
This block may be called multiple times during the registration process. The
parameter becomes
when the registration process completes. Return
from the block to stop the registration operation, like after receiving an error.
Registered fonts are discoverable through font descriptor matching in the calling process.

abstract.text: Create text layouts, optimize font handling, and access font metrics and glyph data.
Matches font descriptors and tracks progress with a progress handler.
A comparator function to compare font family names and sort them according to Apple guidelines.
Returns an array of visible font family names sorted for user interface display.
Returns an array of font URLs.
Returns an array of unique PostScript font names for the fonts.
Creates a font descriptor representing the font in the supplied data.
Returns an array of font descriptors representing each of the fonts in the specified URL.
Creates a reference to a run loop source used to convey font requests from the Font Manager.
Enables or disables the matching font descriptors for font descriptor matching.
Gets the auto-activation setting for the specified bundle identifier.
Returns the registration scope of the specified URL.
Determines whether a file is in a supported font format.
Registers fonts from the specified font URLs with the font manager.
Registers fonts from the specified font URL with the Font Manager. Registered fonts are discoverable through font descriptor matching.
Registers fonts from the specified array of font URLs with the Font Manager. Registered fonts are discoverable through font descriptor matching.
Registers the specified graphics font with the font manager.
Resolves font descriptors specified on input.
Constants that define the scope for font registration.
The font is available to all processes for the current user session and will be available in subsequent sessions unless unregistered.
A reference to an immutable array object.
A reference to a CFError object.
A false value.
A true value.
A reference to an immutable array object.
A value type whose instances are either `true` or `false`.
